result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Clerk Cheree
Cases 15CF339 and 15CM705 called: 11:08am
State appears by ADA M.Puerner. Defendant appears in person/in custody and with Atty Jack Bliss.
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW

State notes agreement that no new charges will be brought regarding phone calls in June as part of plea agreement today; Atty Bliss also states agreement.

State moves to:
15CF339 - Ct. 1 (Intimidate Victim/DA)>>AMEND to DC/DA
15CF339 - Ct. 2 (Battery/DA)>>AMEND to DC/DA
15CM705>>D&RI entire file
COURT GRANTS ABOVE

PLEA:
Ct. 1 (DC/DA)>>NO CONTEST
Ct. 2 (DC/DA)>>NO CONTEST
Ct. 3 (DC/DA)>>NO CONTEST

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.

COURT ORDERS:
Ct. 1>>90 days MCJ w/credit for 90 days of time already served; CC including one domestic abuse surcharge.
Cts. 2 and 3>> Sentence W/held on each count; 1 year probation on each count, concurrent
CONDITIONS: Safe program assessment and any follow up; Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; CC including 2 domestic abuse surcharges; FTE/FT schooling or a combination thereof, or any week defendant does not meet that requirement, he must perform 10 hours of community service per week; DNA sample and surcharges.
>>In the event of any revocation, defendant is entitled to 15 days credit of time served.

Adj: 11:18am

Clerk Cheree
Cases 15CF339 and 15CM705 Called: 3:17pm
State appears by ADA M.Puerner; Deft appears in person/in custody and with Atty Jack Bliss
Waiver of Prelim. filed in 15CF339
 
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information filed.  Reading Waived.
Plea:  NOT GUILTY to all counts
Dates already set (PTC 5/4/15 on both cases)
Bond:  Continued

COURT questions if discovery has been provided - State notes it has not yet but will be provided before the time of the pretrial.

Adj: 3:20pm

AMENDED.  Includes 15CF339 and 15CM705.  No contact with victim(s):  C.F. (NON-WAIVABLE); D.J.F.   Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Police escort to retrieve any personal belongings.

Clerk Cheree
Cases 15CF339 and 15CM705 called: 10:06am
State appears by ADA M.Puerner; Defendant appears in person/pro se/in custody

State notes information received that Atty Bohn has conflict on this case and PD's office has reassigned to Atty Jack Bliss; Requests COURT find cause to toll TL for waiver.
COURT questions defendant regarding his position on the request - Defendant states he wants atty
COURT tolls time limits - 
Defendant requests that bond be amended - COURT will not address that request until defendant has counsel with him

15CM705 IA>>
COURT reads complaint to defendant
COURT enters NOT GUILTY on behalf of defendant
PTC set for 5/4 already - also set for CC 4/16 at 1:00 to set PH
Bond set in 15CF339 to also cover 15CM705 with same conditions - State files order for no contact and COURT signs; COURT advises defendant that he may have no contact whatsoever with alleged victim.

Adj: 10:15
